issue.title: [CF 538] Target friendly-hostile
issue.body:
Is there a way to setup conditions to check if current target is friendly or hostile? Currently using powerauras for this because I couldnt find this function in TMW. If other addons do it I dont see reason why TWM doesnt :P


> Posted by CurseForge user Onorc | Imported from CurseForge issue #538 | Raw

comments.body:
This is handled by the "Unit Reaction" condition in the "Unit Attributes" category


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks! Gonna check it out when I get back from work


> Posted by CurseForge user Onorc
